title: Mr. Malaprop
author: VD
content_html:
Is apparently a Muslim after all:

“Let’s not play games. What I was suggesting — you’re absolutely right that John McCain has not talked about my Muslim faith.”
– Barack Obama

I really wish Obama would debate George W. Bush. It would be just like the Lincoln-Douglas debates, only the exact opposite. Nice to see little Georgie Steph leaping in and helping him out, though.

And the man just keeps digging himself in deeper:

“If you’ve got a gun in your house, I’m not taking it. Even if I want to take them away, I don’t have the votes in Congress.”
– Barack Obama, 5 Sep 2008
